TxtRotate(el,toRotate,period){this.toRotate=toRotate;this.el=el;this.loopNum=0;this.period=parseInt(period,10)||2000;this.txt="";this.tick();this.isDeleting=false;};TxtRotate.prototype.tick=function(){var i=this.loopNum%this.toRotate.length;var fullTxt=this.toRotate[i];if(this.isDeleting){this.txt=fullTxt.substring(0,this.txt.length-1);}else{this.txt=fullTxt.substring(0,this.txt.length+1);}this.el.innerHTML=''+this.txt+"";var that=this;var delta=150-Math.random()*100;if(this.isDeleting){delta/=2;}if(!this.isDeleting&&this.txt===fullTxt){delta=this.period;this.isDeleting=true;}else if(this.isDeleting&&this.txt===""){this.isDeleting=false;this.loopNum++;delta=500;}setTimeout(function(){that.tick();},delta);};window.onload=function(){var
